item.title: Delegation
item.description:
• bus factor
  • choose your battles
  • define the standards - design patterns, paradigms, technologies, coding standards
  • problems are on you, not them
  • help them understand what they can do
  • let people do mistakes you can afford to do as a team
  • software design is not a democracy
  • never blame, always ask
  • acknowledge emotions as legitimate
